actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to provide a standard for valuation of nonmonetary contributions to candidates for Federal office.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to set a standard with which to measure non-monetary contributions to candidates for Federal office.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to provide a standard for valuation of nonmonetary contributions to candidates for Federal office.
